thread.title: AFGE: Pentagon proposal scraps workplace protections
thread.title_full: AFGE: Pentagon proposal scraps workplace protections

title: AFGE: Pentagon proposal scraps workplace protections
text:
17 AFGE: Pentagon proposal scraps workplace protections 
Federal Times: A new Department of Defense proposal to reshape the way it recruits, compensates and manages employees landed with a thud of discontent from unions.The American Federation of Government Employees released the proposal on Sept. 15, decrying the plan as a revisit to "failed policies from the Bush administration."
